author: David Richards
comment: I reinstalled 2x and it doesn't line up even close on my Moto 360 2nd gen!!!!

reply.author: Game Booster
reply.content: Moto 2 is not supported. You returned the money.

author: Jorge Colmenares
comment: The concept is good but characters are way too big and bad colors choice needs work but good direction

The watch face has no order and some of the digital displays are over each other making it impossible to read, the seven segment display is in the wrong position on the watch, the face looks as if it is for a different type of watch when displayed on my Hauwei classic

reply.author: Game Booster
reply.content:
Hauwei classic is not included in the support.
Compatible with: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG Watch Urbane 
and for square watches Sony SmartWatch3.

title: What a shame, could have been good!!
